articles.author: Katcy Stephan
articles.title: Renee Zellweger to Return for ‘Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy’ With Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson - Variety
articles.description: Renée Zellweger is set to return to one of her most beloved roles in Universal Pictures’ and Working Title’s "Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy."
articles.content: Two-time Oscar winner Renée Zellweger is set to return to one of her most beloved roles in Universal Pictures’ and Working Title’s “Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy,” an adaptation of Helen Fielding’… [+2061 chars]
